sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-button v-b-toggle.collapse-1 variant="success m-2">建立消息</b-button>
    <b-collapse id="collapse-1" class="m-2">
        <b-card>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">消息標題</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-input v-model="creating.data.title" placeholder="請填入消息標題"></b-form-input>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>

            <label for="">內文</label>
            <b-form-textarea
                id="textarea"
                v-model="creating.data.context"
                placeholder="請填入消息內文"
                rows="10"
                max-rows="6"
                ></b-form-textarea>
            <b-row class="my-2">
                <b-col md="2">
                    <label for="">消息類型</label>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="10">
                    <b-form-select v-model="creating.notification.id" :options="options"></b-form-select>
                </b-col>
                <b-col md="12 text-center">
                    <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="createData">創建</b-button>
                </b-col>
            </b-row>
        </b-card>
    </b-collapse>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    name: 'App',
    data(){
        return {
            options: [
                { value: 1, text: '公告' },
                { value: 2, text: '研習' },
                { value: 3, text: '活動' },
                { value: 4, text: '競賽' },
                { value: 5, text: '徵才' }
            ],
            creating: {
                data: [],
                notification: {
                    id: 1
                }
            },
        }
    },
    created(){
        
    },
    methods: 
    {
        createData(){
            axios({
                method: 'post',
                url: 'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/public/api/news/create/',
                data: {
                    "title": this.creating.data.title,
                    "context": this.creating.data.context,
                    "reports": "1",
                    "type": Number(this.creating.notification.id)
                },
                dataType: 'json',
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json",
                    "Accept": "application/json",
                    "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + localStorage.getItem('API_TOKEN'),
                }
            })
                .then(response => {
                    console.log(response.data);
                    this.response.value = true;
                    this.response.status = true;
                })
                .catch( (error) => {
                    console.log(error);
                    this.response.value = true;
                    this.response.status = false;
                })
        }
    }
}
</script>
